data.text: @RanelGallardo @Swestfall @wachamberlain Skip the argument for wearing helmets while riding bicycles has been won.
@Swestfall @baseballbarry2 @wachamberlain It’ll be hard for them to believe in rural areas where you can see people dying in large numbers evidently via eyes.

@RanelGallardo @baseballbarry2 @wachamberlain Mishandling it means they would have reliable info that would show them it was being mishandled. They only get state run media. Everything else is blocked. You’re assuming they have freedom to information. They don’t. When I was there, what I heard on news was 100% inaccurate.
@baseballbarry2 @Swestfall @wachamberlain It will be a slow process but I think mishandling COVID is a good way to do it.
@RanelGallardo @wachamberlain You might want to brush up on your Russian current events.
